resources.string:
Om Jai Lakshmi Mata,

Maiya Jai Lakshmi Mata,
 Tumko Nishdin Sevat,
 Maiya ji ko nishdin sevat
 Har Vishnu Vidhata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Maiya Jai Laxmi Mata
 Tumko Nishdin Sevat,
 Maiya ji ko nishdin sevat
 Har Vishnu Vidhata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Uma Rama Bramhani, 
 Tum Hi Jag Mata,
 Maiya Tum Hi Jag Mata
 Surya Chandrma Dhyavat Narad Rishi Gaata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Durga Roop Niranjani,
 Sukh Sampatti Daata,
 Maiya Sukhh Sampatti Data
 Jo Koi Tum Ko Dhyawat,
Riddhi Siddhi Dhan Pata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Tum Paatal Nivasini, 
 Tum Hi Shubh Daata,
 Karm-Prabhaav-Prakashini,
 Bhav Nidhi Ki Trata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Jis Ghar Tum Rehti Taha,
 Sab Sadgun Aata,
 Maiya Sab Sad Gun Aata
 Sab Sambhav Ho Jata,
 Sab Sambhav Ho Jata,
 Man Nahi Ghabrata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Tum Bin Yagya Na Hotey,
 Vastra Na Ho Pata,
 Maiya,Vastra Na Ho Pata,
 Khan-Paan Ka Vaibhav,
Khan-Paan Ka Vaibhav,
 Sab Tumse Aata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Shubhgun Mandir Sundar,
Sheerodadhi Jata,
 Ratn Chaturdhsh Tum Bin,
Ratn Chaturdhsh Tum Bin,
Koi Nahi Pata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Mahalakshmi Ji Ki Aarti,
 Jo Koi Nar Gata,
 Maiyya Jo koi Nar Gaata
 Urr Anand Samata,
 Urr Anand Samata,
 Paap Utar Jata.

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Maiya Jai Laxmi Mata
 Tumko Nishdin Sevat,
 Maiya ji ko nishdin sevat
 Har Vishnu Vidhata.

Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Maiya Jai Laxmi Mata
 Tumko Nishdin Sevat,
 Tumko Nishdin Sevat,

Har Vishnu Vidhata.
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
 Om Jai Lakshmi Mata

Maiya Jai Laxmi Mata
 Tumko Nishdin Sevat,
 Maiya ji ko nishdin sevat
 Har Vishnu..........
